data.eml:eml: A new species of Discothyrea Roger from Mauritius and a New species of Proceratium Roger from Madagascar (Hymenoptera: Formicidae).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fisher, B. L. (2005): A new species of Discothyrea Roger from Mauritius and a New species of Proceratium Roger from Madagascar (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Proceedings of the California Academy of Sciences 56: 657-667, URL: http://antbase.org/ants/publications/20971/20971.pdf
